activity.name: Pre-screening is the process of reviewing each document before we begin a new activity in the Tapestry system.
activity.description: Pre-screening is the process of reviewing each document before we begin a new activity in the Tapestry system.

activity.name: As agents, we are required to pre-screen all documents.
activity.description: As agents, we are required to pre-screen all documents.

activity.name: Pre-screening helps us know we have all of the required documents and necessary information before we start an activity in Tapestry.
activity.description: Pre-screening helps us know we have all of the required documents and necessary information before we start an activity in Tapestry.

activity.name: You may think you don't have time to pre-screen documents.
activity.description: You may think you don't have time to pre-screen documents.

activity.name: But the fact is: You don't have time not to!
activity.description: But the fact is: You don't have time not to!

activity.name: Taking the time to review the documentation first, before you begin any activity in Tapestry, decreases errors.
activity.description: Taking the time to review the documentation first, before you begin any activity in Tapestry, decreases errors.

activity.name: If you successfully pre-screen, your chances of completing your transaction accurate and timely have increased.
activity.description: If you successfully pre-screen, your chances of completing your transaction accurate and timely have increased.

activity.name: And that's a very good thing!
activity.description: And that's a very good thing!
